name: Chakra Align - Herbal Yoga Mat, 7mm
description:
"My practice soared -I'll never go back to a typical mat again"
Strengthening and Health Promoting Yoga Rug
Unleash your potential with our new Chakra Energy mat! Each 7 Chakra colors are naturally dyed with medicinal Ayurvedic plants. This mat was designed to help align your energy and support your optimal wellness. Hand-loomed with GOTS certified cotton and ethically made by artisans with love. You will love the soft, cushy feel and natural beauty of this mat. Includes a FREE case and wildcrafted soap nut laundry detergent.
FUNCTIONAL    - Sweat & Slip Resistant   - Extra Supportive, 7mm thick cotton   - Ultra Light 4 lbs, 77" x27"   - No Sliding with Natural Tree Rubber Coated Bottom   - Lasts Longer than Typical Mats     - Naturally Antibacterial and Antimicrobial
ALL NATURAL   - Hand-loomed & Plant Dyed   - 100% GOTS Certified Organic Cotton   - No Off-gassing or Plastic Mat Smell   - FREE of Chemicals, Heavy Metals, PVC, BPA, and Phthalates   - Zero Plastic Packaging   - 100% Biodegradable and Eco-Friendly
WELLNESS PROMOTING   - Ayurvedic Medicinal Plant Dyes   - 20 Skin Soothing Herbs (Iike Turmeric, Neem and Holy Basil)   - Skin Soothing & Stress Reducing Herbal Properties

name: Solar Flower - Naturally Dyed Herbal Yoga Mat 7mm
description:
"My practice soared -I'll never go back to a typical mat again"

Strengthening and Health Promoting Yoga Rug

Harness the Spring & Summer energy with our new limited edition Solar Flower mat.  Inspired by Matisse and rooted in Ayurvedic wisdom, the Solar Flower is our newest hand-loomed yoga rug—infused with the spirit of marigolds, sunflowers, and the sun itself.⁠ In Ayurveda, solar-aligned blooms symbolize clarity, energy, and uplifted emotional states. Just like your practice, they’re radiant reminders of your vitality. 
Unleash your potential with our herbal dyed yoga rug! Rejuvenate on the world's most natural yoga mat. Each mat is hand-loomed with GOTS certified cotton and plant dyed using an ancient process that preserves the bioactive medicinal qualities of the plants. Feel the difference and experience your strength, balance and wellness soar on the beautiful and ethically made mat.

name: Diamond Yoga Mat - Clay 7mm - Organic Cotton
description:
Best grip of any yoga rug guaranteed!

Our all new organic cotton Diamond mat is world's first mat featuring zigzag grip strips with an invisible tree rubber coating for ultimate grip. It's also our thickest mat at 7mm thick! Naturally dyed with soothing herbs. This is the most luxurious cozy and functional mat on the market!- FREE Carry Case + Mat Wash (Soap Nuts)

FUNCTIONAL   - Ultra thick - 7 mm   - Extra Long + Wide - 74" x27"   - Light - 4.3 lbs   - Non-Skid - Natural Tree Rubber Coated Bottom   - Non-Slip - Natural Tree Rubber Coated Top Grip Strips   - Non-Stink - Naturally Antibacterial and Antimicrobial   - Best Grip - Builds More Strength + Balance   - Easy Machine Washable
  NATURAL   - 100% GOTS Certified Organic Cotton   - Ethically Hand-loomed & Plant Dyed   - No Off-gassing or VOC Plastic Mat Smell   - FREE of Chemicals, Heavy Metals, PVC, BPA, and Phthalates   - Zero Plastic Packaging   - 100% Biodegradable and Eco-Friendly
 WELLNESS PROMOTING   - Ayurvedic Medicinal Plant Dyes   - 20 Skin Soothing & Relaxing Herbs (Iike Turmeric, Neem and Holy Basil)   - Peace of Mind - Ethically Handloomed
